description:
Roguelite is one of the hottest subgenres in gaming right now. From Balatro to Drop Duchy, developers have integrated cyclical mechanics into all sorts of other genres. Independent studios eSolu and Team Mojo Games are adding another game to the subgenre with Odds Chronicles.

Odds Chronicles combines grid-based combat, a roguelite run structure, and dice mechanics to create its overall package. Each roll of the dice will give your team different resources, including attributes like strength and magic.

Dice-based roguelites and roguelikes, including standouts like Dicey Dungeons, have been around for some time, but new takes on rolling the dice are welcome. Bringing dice mechanics into a turn-based grid tactics game is a nice way to build off the SOCOM-like percentages that decide whether or not you'll land your attacks.
title: Odds Chronicle Rolls Luck And Strategy Into A Tabletop-Inspired Roguelite
Lego Fortnite 691-Piece Supply Llama Is Only $26 At Amazon

description:
Tian Wen seems to always want to send you out to find a cache in Arc Raiders, and his quest Marked for Death is no different. This time around, you're asked to visit the Buried City and round up a cache at the Su Durante Warehouses point of interest. Though the quest is straightforward overall, it can be easy to overlook exactly where you need to be checking to find this cache. So, we've put together a guide to show you where to go to find the cache at the Su Durante Warehouses.

Where to find the cache at the Su Durante Warehouses in Arc Raiders

Completing the Marked for Death quest doesn't require you to extract from Buried City, so if you're worried that you might not make it out alive, it's best that you enter the raid using a free loadout. This ensures you won't lose any hard-earned resources you've been saving up.

Either way you decide to go about raiding for this quest, though, you'll need to find t
title: Arc Raiders Marked For Death Quest Guide
How To Get New Harry Potter Full-Cast Audiobook Edition For 99 Cents

description:
As you work your way through Tian Wen's questline in Arc Raiders, you'll eventually begin a quest called Market Correction, which tasks you with finding and sabotaging a cache in the Buried City. This quest is relatively straightforward in execution, but finding the precise spot where the cache is located might prove a bit tricky--especially in the midst of chaotic battles with the ARC and other raiders who may be working on the same quest.

When you're ready to complete Market Correction, you can follow the steps below to round up the cache at Marano Station and be one step closer to finishing up Tian Wen's expectations for you.

Where to find the cache at Marano Station in Arc Raiders

Market Correction takes place in the Buried City map. You won't need to extract to complete the quest, so feel free to load in using a Free Loadout if you're worried you might not make it back alive.
title: Arc Raiders Market Correction Quest Guide

description:
Like many live-service games, Arc Raiders provides players with a battle pass to complete to obtain a variety of unique cosmetics, currencies, and one-time-use resources that can help with a raid. These are designed to be worked on over time and will take most players a few weeks to wrap up, with some being permanent and others only being available for a limited time.

At launch, players can work on the Raider Deck AR/RD 001, which is focused on the Ryder and Voyager outfits. In addition to the outfits, unlockables include outfit variants, hairstyles, face styles, emotes, and more. You can even earn 500 Raider Tokens (premium currency) by completing the entire deck, which can be used to purchase cosmetics from the in-game shop.

To unlock these rewards, you'll need to wo
title: All Arc Raiders Battle Pass Rewards In Raider Deck 1

description:
Nearly 50 years ago, Atari published Breakout, a spin on the ball-bouncing gameplay of Pong where your opponent wasn't another player but rather an increasingly dense wall of bricks slowly dropping down towards you. Arkanoid, released not long after, expanded on its foundations, giving players more ways to play through the introduction of upgrades to your paddle, spawning additional balls, and more.

These are two games that Ball x Pit designer Kenny Sun was clearly inspired by, but not the two that this modern interpretation solely borrows from. Instead, Ball x Pit is an intoxicating mash-up that includes elements of Vampire Survivors, numerous roguelites, and town-management wrapped up in an engaging adventure down a bottomless pit that is chaotic and engaging, but also slightly messy in its execution.
title: Ball X Pit Review - Off The Wall

description:
Arc Raiders is an extraction shooter that takes place in a punishing world featuring robotic enemies that can destroy you for making one wrong move. When you add in the threat of other players who might want to kill you and take your loot, too, you really need to make sure you're prepared to fight at all times. But there's a bit more to the game than just survival, as there are also a variety of quests to complete that can provide you with resources that will help you on your journey through Speranza. Below, we've listed out every quest you can undertake in Arc Raiders.

Arc Raiders missions list

There are currently 63 quests in Arc Raiders, though more will be added with future updates. As of right now, you can expect to spend dozens of hours completing these quests, which task you with finding spots on the map to interact with, looting unique resources to return safely to someone in Speranza, or defeating spec
title: All Arc Raiders Quests - Full Mission List

description:
Last year, Netflix released a documentary called The Remarkable Life of Ibelin, which followed the story of Mats Steen, a Norwegian gamer who found community and acceptance through World of Warcraft as his body suffered the effects of a rare form of muscular dystrophy. Now, Steen's life is being adapted as a scripted film, which already has a number of stars lined up.

According to Deadline, the cast of Ibelin includes Charlie Plummer, Anthony Hopkins, Toni Collette, Stephen Graham, Isabela Merced, and Maisy Stella. The Imitation Game director Morten Tyldum will helm the film from a script by Ilaria Bernardini and Hossein Amini. The story will be based on Steen's blog, Musings of Life, which he wrote until he passed away at 25 in 2014.

Whi
title: Bio Movie About Warcraft Player Ibelin Lines Up An Impressive Cast

description:
After selling 7 million copies right out of the gate, EA's Battlefield 6 has now surpassed 10 million units sold. That's according to Rhys Elliott of Alinea Analytics. He said in an interview with GI.biz that his firm came up with this estimate and that it applies to copies sold across all platforms.

EA, however, has yet to officially announce any other sales number for Battlefield 6 beyond 7 million. In any event, Elliott said Battlefield 6's strong launch "won't be enough to overturn Call of Duty's overall market dominance," or at least not in 2025.

Whereas the Battlefield series historically performs best on PC, Activision's Call of Duty series is a "multiplatform powerhouse" that is known to perform well
title: Battlefield 6 Reaches 10 Million Copies Sold, But Won't Be Enough To Topple Call Of Duty, Analyst Says
Hyrule Warriors: Age Of Imprisonment Launch-Day Delivery Still Available At Amazon

description:
"Don't shoot!" I called out to the raider from a nearby bush. "I'm coming out, but I mean you no harm." Clearly startled by my presence and reacting based on what was more than likely a combination of the Rocketeer hovering menacingly close and a history of earlier betrayals, the dusty raider pointed his weathered Ferro rifle my way. He'd already called for the elevator to bring him back to Speranza safe and sound, so it's no wonder that he'd be anxious. He was in danger of losing everything right at the finish line, just before those saferoom doors opened. But so was I, and he didn't know--couldn't know--that I hadn't ever killed a raider before.

I could see him measuring my trustworthiness on the fly. "The robots are the bad guys, right?" I continued, sweating out the moment every second he didn't lower his gun. "If I killed you here, you'd be the first raider I've shot down. I'm just trying to get home, same as you." I kept moving so he couldn'
title: Arc Raiders Review - Stronger Together

description:
The newest Fortnite season, which is all about The Simpsons, is putting up big numbers. Epic Games announced today that, after the first 48 hours, the new Simpsons season of Fortnite helped propel the game to the "biggest number of new and returning Fortnite players" since the Holiday 2024 season.

What's more, Epic said the first of multiple Simpson shorts on Disney+ became the platform's No. 1 program. "Move over Shelbyville," Epic said, referencing Springfield's rival next-door neighbor.

Epic did not announce a specific player figure, but data showed that the game eclipsed 2.7 million concurrent players over the weekend when the Simpsons update came out. That's a massive figure, but it's nowhere close to F
title: Fortnite's Simpsons Update Led To A Huge Surge In Players, The Most In A Long Time

description: The November 2025 lineup of PC games for Humble Choice subscribers has been revealed, and this month, you can wage large-scale battles in the grimdark realm of Warhammer, play an underwater souls-like, and pit an assassin against aliens in an over-the-top adventure.
title: Get Total Warhammer 3 And Seven More Games For Just $15 At Humble This Month

description:
With Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's release date coming up soon, Activision has now announced the official launch times for the game and confirmed when preloading begins.

Preloading begins for all platforms at 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET on November 10, while the full game unlocks at midnight local time on November 14, and that means people in New Zealand are getting in first. You can see the full launch schedule and preloading details below.

Black Ops 7 preloading times

Preloading goes live for all platforms on November 10 at the following times:

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Launch Times And Preloading Info Revealed
Star Wars Baby Yoda With Hover Pram Lego Model Gets Massive Discount

description:
One of the most terrifying things you'll ever see in life is a fresh ding or a scrape on your car, but Wreckfest 2 developer Bugbear Entertainment is embracing this horror with the next update for the game. Whereas other car games allow you to create four-wheeled art with their livery editors, Bugbear is instead focusing on hurting the resale value of your digital jalopy with its car editor, fittingly dubbed the "CRAP-IT" toolset.

As demonstrated in the video below, you can create crimes against pixels by ruining the body of your car with bumps, watch the paintwork decay as rust sets in, and make car collectors lament the fate of your vehicle when you attempt to cover up the damage with badly placed decals.
title: Your Wreckfest 2 Rides Are About To Look Like Actual Crap (But In A Good Way)

description:
Nintendo released its latest quarterly earnings report today for the six-month period that ended on September 30, revealing a number of new details about the health of the company's business, including updated sales figures for the Switch and Switch 2. The original Switch has now sold 154.01 million units since it launched in 2017, and that's fairly close to the PS2's lifetime record of 160 million.

Will the Switch be able to catch the PS2? Probably not, says one analyst. Even so, the Switch is about to pass the Nintendo DS (154.02 million units sold) to become Nintendo's best-selling platform ever. It needs just 10,000 more sales to match the DS. This has no doubt already happened, as Nintendo's numbers run through September 30, and that's already more than a month ago. However, this won't be official until Nintendo releases its next earnings report in February 2026 or sooner if the company opts to make an announcement outside of its scheduled earnings releases.

Daniel
title: Switch Is About To Pass DS To Become Nintendo's Best-Selling Platform Ever, But May Not Beat PS2

description:
Nintendo has unveiled a new Metroid Prime 4: Beyond trailer titled Survive, showcasing what awaits Samus Aran on the planet Viewros. The roughly 70-second video features the bounty hunter's gunship in aerial combat and a pretty slick motorcycle move by Samus that's an homage to the Akira slide.

The Metroid Prime 4 trailer--seen below--also highlights a variety of locales on the mysterious planet. Samus finds herself in a lush jungle, outside a spiky black building that would look at home in The Matrix, and what we can only assume is the obligatory lava area at one point. The bounty hunter also scans a new enemy mechanoid called a psy-bot soldier as well as fights the boss Aberax (previously highlighted during a Nintendo Treehouse stream).

The
title: New Metroid Prime 4 Trailer Has Space Battles, Samus Flips, And An Akira Slide
Tuxedo Cat Lego Set Is On Sale For Its Lowest Price Yet Right Meow

description:
The Simpsons have taken over Fortnite for the month of November, but players won't be sneaking around Springfield forever. A few hints for Fortnite Chapter 7 have started to emerge, and signs point to the immanent arrival of The Bride, a character played by Uma Thurman in Quentin Tarantino's Kill Bill Vol. 1 and 2.

Fortnite content creator NickEh30 posted a teaser for Chapter Seven that has a set of coordinates that lead to the Hollywood sign. The text in the teaser says, "Now Playing / Zero Hour / Chapter Seven / Fortnite After Dark With Q&U." In Kill Bill, Q&U was the abbreviation that Tarantino and Thurman used for their collaboration.
title: Fortnite Chapter Seven Teasers Hint At Kill Bill Collaboration

description: Lucy and Kurt discuss the dumbest video game related irems they've purchased. And, well, Lucy takes the cake on whatever this is. Watch the full Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered Episode.
title: Lucy's WORST Gaming Purchase

description:
The next big addition to Fortnite generated some big complaints, but fortunately, you can raise those directly at developer Epic Games in a new survey from the studio.

With the new mini-season based on The Simpsons comes the debut of Sidekicks, adorable pets that accompany you (and offer no gameplay advantage) on your battle royale bouts. But a closer look at the fine print reveals that the base appearance of these cute cosmetic creatures can only be customized once they have been obtained.

That means if you purchase a Sidekick from the Fortnite item shop, you only get one chance to determine its basic look, and you won't be able to change it afterward. If you want the same Sidekick but with, say, a different fur color, you'll have to buy it again. You can cha
title: You Can Express Anger At Fortnite About Sidekick Restrictions Through A New Survey

description:
World of Warcraft's most infamous and expensive mount might be coming back after having only been available for a limited time.

According to a datamine by Wowhead, a shop-file description mentions a "Brutosaur Comeback." The description doesn't specify which massive dinosaur Brutosaur mount it is, but it's likely not the original Mighty Caravan Brutosaur that was available during the game's Battle for Azeroth expansion to the tune of 5 million gold.
title: WoW's Infamous $90 Dinosaur Mount May Be Coming Back

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's release on November 14 is right around the corner. Outside of the campaign and multiplayer, the popular Zombies mode returns. The main quest for the new Zombies map, Ashes of the Damned, will go live on the same day that the game itself debuts, and now we know the precise time when the quest will be available for everyone.

Activision announced that the main quest for Ashes of the Damned will open at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET on Friday, November 14. "Set your reminders and choose your team carefully… this won't be a walk in the park," Activision said. Here are more launch times:

Black Ops 7 Zombies main quest launch times

November 14
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Zombies Main Quest Start Times Revealed

description:
Nintendo's litigation against Palworld developer Pocketpair is becoming increasingly complicated by the day, with one recent patent granted to the Pokemon franchise now under review by the United States.

According to a new Games Fray report, the new head of the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO), John A. Squires, has ordered a reexamination of Nintendo’s Patent No. 12,403,397. Filed in January 2023, granted to Nintendo in September 2025, and dubbed the '397 patent, the listing is oftentimes oversimplified to "summoning characters and making them fight." It's for this reason that Squires's office is seeking to determine if such a feature is ev
title: Pokemon "Summon" Patent To Be Reexamined Under New USPTO Boss' Orders

description:
Vampire Survivors has spawned a wave of games inspired by it in the years since it was first released, and Warhammer Survivors is the next game set in this genre of endless hordes and power-ups. Featuring characters and weapons from both Warhammer 40K and Warhammer: Age of Sigmar, Warhammer Survivors is a co-production between Auroch Digital and Vampire Survivors developer Poncle, using the same engine that powers the roguelite survivors game it's inspired by. It's scheduled to launch in 2026 for PC via Steam.

Like Vampire Survivors, the focus will be on taking down waves of enemies, powering up your character, and evolving your weapons. You can choose to p
title: Warhammer Survivors Announced, And It's Basically Grimdark Vampire Survivors

description:
One of the best ways to progress your account in Arc Raiders during the early game is by completing quests. At first, you're given tutorial-style quests that are intended to get you accustomed to the game's mechanics and gameplay loop. However, after those initial quests are complete, you're thrown straight into the action with some challenging objectives. One of the harder quests you'll get assigned after your first few are complete is called Off the Radar, and this requires you to locate Field Depots in Arc Raiders.

To make matters even more difficult, though, the quest actually tries to unintentionally throw you off with the way it describes a Field Depot. If you're looking to make Off the Radar simpler in Arc Raiders, take a look at the guide below for every Field Depot location.

How to find Field Depots in Arc Raiders

While Field Depots can be found on every map in Arc Raiders, you get the Off the Ra
title: Field Depot Locations In Arc Raiders

description:
Lots of new games


It's a big month for Xbox Game Pass, as Microsoft is releasing a whopping six day-one new releases into the catalog in the first half of the month alone. Among the brand-new releases that are debuting into the catalog is Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 on November 14, and it's arguably Microsoft's biggest release of the whole year.

Other day-one new releases for Game Pass for the first half of November 2025 include Dead Static Drive, Egging On, Whiskerwood, Pigeon Simulator, and Winter Burrow.

Microsoft is expected to announce a second wave of titles for Game Pass later this month, so check back later for that.

In terms of removals, Microsoft is dumping six titles on November 15, including Stalker 2, which launched i
title: Game Pass Adds Black Ops 7 And Five More Day-One New Releases In A Big Month For The Service

description:
Developer Embark Studios wants to make it right for Arc Raiders players who dealt with server problems over the weekend. As such, anyone who logged in to the extraction shooter on November 2 will receive 500 Raider Tokens.

The official Arc Raiders account on X announced the in-game compensation for players. The post acknowledges "that our servers had a wobble on Sunday," with SteamDB noting the game hit a new peak concurrent-players count of 354,836 people on Steam that day. This comes after Arc Raiders already broke a Steam record for extraction shooters with PvP. Keep in mind that the game is also available on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S (as well as Epic Games Store), so these numbers ar
title: Arc Raiders Players Receiving In-Game Compensation For Server Struggles

description:
You might think that your weapons or gear or inventory items are the most important elements of your Arc Raiders account, but the answer is, actually, your pet chicken. At the start of Arc Raiders, you'll be gifted Scrappy, a chicken that can collect resources for you while you're out killing enemies during a drop. To make Scrappy even stronger, it can be upgraded to be even better at its job.

Like all upgrades in Arc Raiders, Scrappy requires some specific resources every time you go to advance its level. If you want to progress Scrappy to level three, you'll need to acquire three lemons and three apricots. While this might sound like a trivial task, just wait until you learn how rare lemons and apricots can be in Arc Raiders.

Lemon and apricot locations in Arc Raiders

In general, you'll be
title: Where To Get Lemons And Apricots In Arc Raiders

description:
Levels come pretty slowly in Arc Raiders, and you receive only one skill point per level up. With this in mind, you'll want to make the absolute most out of your limited skill points to ensure that you're ready to take on all of the ARC and potential raiders you'll encounter topside. While there really aren't any wrong answers to filling out your skill tree, there are some skills that provide substantial improvements to your mobility, looting, and crafting. Later in the game, you'll likely want to branch out into some other utility options, too, but we've compiled the eight best skills we think you should grab first in Arc Raiders.

For more on Embark's new extraction shooter, use our
title: Best Arc Raiders Skills To Unlock First

description: A few issues hold it back, but Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment marks a high point for the spin-off series, iterating on its riotous hack-and-slash combat with depth and variety.
title: Age Of Imprisonment A Link To The Past Review

description:
There's been a veritable cornucopia of Dynasty Warriors spin-offs over the years, including anime adaptations like Gundam, Berserk, and One Piece and video game collaborations with Persona and Fire Emblem. The 2014 collab Hyrule Warriors and its sequel, Age of Calamity, are perhaps the most warmly received of them all, owing to their blend of Omega Force's overblown hack-and-slash action with The Legend of Zelda's iconic characters, locations, and enemies.

With Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment, the two long-running series are more intertwined than ever, to the point where it feels more like a brand-new Zelda release than just another musou spin-off. It's not without its faults and is unlikely to convert anyone unconvinced by this style of game already, but Age of Imprisonment improves upon its predecessors in numerous ways.

The game's story is the most obvious aspect where the two series are aligned. Unlike Age of Calamity and its alter
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age Of Imprisonment Review - Link To The Past

description:
A new study has revealed its findings on the carbon footprint of physical video games, and unsurprisingly, digitally downloaded games are considered to be more environmentally friendly in comparison to physical. French carbon-accounting firm Greenly studied the environmental impact of various systems and the production of video games, finding that physical copies of games are "100 times more carbon-intensive" than their digital counterparts.

According to Greenly, the manufacturing and transportation of physical games--with 1 million discs being used as an example--could produce 312 tons of carbon dioxide, while 1 million downloads of the same game--if it were 70GB in size--would equal three tons of carbon dioxide emissions.

"Although cloud-based gaming can be detrimental as a result of its need for continuous access to energy-hungry data servers, we also cannot neglect the continued impact of manufacturing and packaging physical video games," study author Stephanie Safd
title: New Study Finds Physical Games Are 100x More Carbon-Intensive Than Digital

description:
Best-sellers


As it does every three months when it releases a quarterly sales report, Nintendo has provided new sales numbers for the best-selling Switch games of all time. There are pretty much no surprises on the list.

At the top of the charts is Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, which has sold an astonishing 69.56 million copies as of September 30 30, 2025. The figure includes copies sold in hardware bundles, but it's an impressive number all the same. For comparison, Red Dead Redemption II and The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt have sold 50 million copies each.

The rest of the top five best-selling Switch games include Animal Crossing: New Horizons (48.62 million copies), Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (36.93 million copies), The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (33.34 million copies), and Super Mario Odyssey (29.84 million copies).

Click through the
title: Top 10 Best-Selling Nintendo Switch Games Of All Time

description:
The best sellers


The Nintendo Switch 2 is finally here, and it's putting up record-breaking numbers. As of September 30, the system has sold more than 10 million units, with 20.6 million games sold.

The Switch 2 still has a long way to go to match the success of its predecessor, the Switch, which has sold more than 154 million units and is closing in on the PS2's record for all-time console sales (160 million). But how do Nintendo's consoles stack up in terms of unit sales and game sales? This gallery has the answers.

As you'll see, the Switch is far and away Nintendo's best-selling home console of all time, but the Nintendo DS outranks it with more than 150 million units sold when combining all of its many permutations. On the other end of the scale, t
title: Top 12 Best-Selling Nintendo Platforms Of All Time And How Many Units They Sold

description:
Nintendo has confirmed that in the last two quarters, it has sold a staggering number of Switch 2 consoles. As part of its latest financial results, the company reported 10.36 million Switch 2 units sold as of September 30, in the two quarters since it went on sale. In the last three months alone, Nintendo sold 4.54 million Switch 2 consoles.

To put that into context, that's more than double what the original Switch console sold within the same two-month time period (4.7 million units sold), and even more than what Sony managed with the PS4 (7.5 million units sold) and PS5 (7.8 million units sold) during its first two quarters. With the Switch 2 selling well,
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Continues To Be A Massive Hit, Selling Over 10 Million Units In Six Months
